name: Emergency
Auto Bill
script:
ip_occupancy = frappe.db.sql("""select * from `tabInpatient Occupancy` ;""" , as_dict = True )
if ip_occupancy:
    
    for ipo in ip_occupancy:
        if ipo.parent:
            ip = frappe.get_doc("Inpatient Record" , ipo.parent)
            if ip.status == "Admitted":
                patientinfo = frappe.get_doc("Patient" , ip.patient)
                service_unit_type = frappe.get_doc("Healthcare Service Unit Type", frappe.db.get_value("Healthcare Service Unit", ipo.service_unit, "service_unit_type"))
                patient = ip.patient
                patient_name = ip.patient_name
                customer = patientinfo.customer
                item_code = service_unit_type.item
                rate = service_unit_type.rate
                desc = service_unit_type.description
                remark = ipo.service_unit
                practitioner = ip.admission_practitioner
                medical_department = ip.medical_department
                salesdoc = frappe.get_doc({
                           
                         
                            "patient": patient,
                            "patient_name": patient_name,
                            "customer" : customer,
                            "is_pos" : 0,
                            "so_type": "Cashiers",
                
                            'due_date' : frappe.utils.getdate(),
                        
                            "remarks" : remark,
                            "posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
                           
                          
                            "doctype": "Sales Invoice",
                      
                            "ref_practitioner" : practitioner,
                            "cost_center": "Hospital - JSH",
                            
                            "items": [
                                {
                                "item_code": item_code,
                                    "item_name": item_code,
                                    "description": desc,
                                    "warehouse":"stores - JSH",
                                 
                
                                    "qty": 1,
                
                                    "rate": rate,
    
                
                                    "doctype": "Sales Invoice Item",
                
                                }
                            ],
                
                        })
                
                salesdoc.insert()
                salesdoc.submit()

name: Bill To
script:
if doc.is_inpatient and doc.outstanding_amount>0 and not doc.is_return:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer' )
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name' )
    To_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.bill_to_patient, 'patient_name' )
    To_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.bill_to_patient, 'customer' )
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Customer",
			"party" : To_patient,
			"debit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
		    "cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"credit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center,
# 			"reference_type": "Sales Invoice",
            # "reference_name": doc.name
		},
    ]
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Transfered from Patient {From_patient_name} to Patient {To_patient_name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"patient_name" : From_patient_name,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)
    
if doc.is_insurance and doc.outstanding_amount>0:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer')
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name')
    insurance_name=frappe.db.get_value('Customer', doc.insurance, 'customer_name' )
    To_patient=doc.insurance
    account = [
		{
			"account":"1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Customer",
			"party" : doc.insurance,
			"debit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"credit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center,
# 			"reference_type": "Sales Invoice",
            # "reference_name": doc.name
		
		},
    ]
    frappe.errprint(account)
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Transfered from Patient  {From_patient_name} to Insurance {insurance_name} Invoice Number {doc.name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"patient_name": From_patient_name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)

if doc.bill_to_employee and doc.outstanding_amount>0:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer')
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name')
    To_empl=frappe.db.get_value('Employee', doc.employee, 'employee_name' )
    To_patient=doc.employee
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"2110 - Creditors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Employee",
			"party" : doc.employee,
			"debit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"credit_in_account_currency": doc.outstanding_amount,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center,
# 			"reference_type": "Sales Invoice",
            # "reference_name": doc.name
		},
    ]
    # frappe.errprint(account)
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Transfered from Patient  {From_patient_name} to Employee {To_empl} Invoice Number {doc.name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"patient_name": doc.patient_name,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)




#Refurn Reverse bill to ...
paid_amount = doc.paid_amount if doc.paid_amount else 0
difference = abs(paid_amount - doc.grand_total)
if doc.bill_to_employee and doc.is_return and difference>0:
    # frappe.msgprint(doc.grand_total)
    # frappe.msgprint(doc.paid_amount)
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer')
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name')
    To_empl=frappe.db.get_value('Employee', doc.employee, 'employee_name' )
    To_patient=doc.employee
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"2110 - Creditors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Employee",
			"party" : doc.employee,
			"credit_in_account_currency": difference,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"debit_in_account_currency": difference,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
    ]
    # frappe.errprint(account)
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Refund from Patient  {From_patient_name} to Employee {To_empl} Invoice Number {doc.name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"patient_name": doc.patient_name,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)

if doc.is_inpatient and  doc.is_return and difference>0:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer' )
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name' )
    To_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.bill_to_patient, 'patient_name' )
    To_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.bill_to_patient, 'customer' )
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Customer",
			"party" : To_patient,
            "credit_in_account_currency": difference,
		    "cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"debit_in_account_currency": difference,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
    ]
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Refunded from Patient {From_patient_name} to Patient {To_patient_name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"patient_name" : From_patient_name,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)
    
if doc.is_insurance and doc.is_return and difference:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    From_patient=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'customer')
    From_patient_name=frappe.db.get_value('Patient', doc.patient, 'patient_name')
    insurance_name=frappe.db.get_value('Customer', doc.insurance, 'customer_name' )
    To_patient=doc.insurance
    account = [
		{
			"account":"1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			"party_type": "Customer",
			"party" : doc.insurance,
			"credit_in_account_currency": difference,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": "1310 - Debtors - "+abbr,
			'party_type': "Customer",
			"party" : From_patient,
			"debit_in_account_currency": difference,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		
		},
    ]
    frappe.errprint(account)
    Journal = frappe.get_doc({
    		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
    		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
    		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
    		"user_remark": f"Refunded from Patient  {From_patient_name} to Insurance {insurance_name} Invoice Number {doc.name}",
    		"accounts": account,
    		"sales_invoice" : doc.name,
    		"patient": doc.patient,
    		"patient_name": From_patient_name
    		
    	})
    Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
    Journal.submit()
    frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice", doc.name, "journal_entry", Journal.name)

name: On Cancel Sales Invoice
script:
# Fetch all Journal Entries linked to this Sales Invoice
journal_entries = frappe.db.get_all(
    "Journal Entry",
    filters={"sales_invoice": doc.name},
    pluck="name"
)

# Loop through and cancel each submitted Journal Entry
for je_name in journal_entries:
    je_doc = frappe.get_doc("Journal Entry", je_name)
    if je_doc.docstatus == 1:
        je_doc.cancel()
        # frappe.msgprint(f"Journal Entry {je_name} has been cancelled.")


sample_collection_name = frappe.db.get_value("Sample Collection",{"reff_invoice": doc.name, "docstatus": 0},"name")
if sample_collection_name:
    sc = frappe.get_doc("Sample Collection", sample_collection_name)
    sc.delete(ignore_permissions=1)  # drafts can be deleted directly
radiology_name = frappe.db.get_value("Radiology",{"reff_invoice": doc.name, "docstatus": 0},"name")
if radiology_name:
    r = frappe.get_doc("Radiology", radiology_name)
    r.delete(ignore_permissions=1)  # drafts can be deleted directly
    
Schdule = frappe.db.get_value("OT Schedule",{"reference": doc.name, "docstatus": 0},"name")
if Schdule:
    r = frappe.get_doc("OT Schedule", Schdule)
    r.delete(ignore_permissions=1)  # drafts can be deleted directly

name: Employee Rece
Cancel Employee rec
Consumable and Billible
script:
if doc.consumable_items:
	items = []
	for item in doc.consumable_items:
			items.append({
				"item_code" : item.item_code,
				"qty" : item.qty,
				
			})
	frappe.errprint(items)
	stock_ent = frappe.get_doc({
		"doctype" : "Stock Entry",
		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.nowdate(),
		"stock_entry_type": "Material Issue",
		"company" : doc.company,
		"from_warehouse": doc.source_warehouse,
		"items" : items,
		})
	stock_ent.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
	stock_ent.submit()
	# doc.db_set("status", "Completed")
	# return stock_ent

if doc.procedure_items:
	pro_items = []
	for item in doc.procedure_items:
			pro_items.append({
				"item_code" : item.item_code,
				"qty" : item.qty
			})
	customer_to = frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "customer")
	sales_doc = frappe.get_doc({
		"doctype" : "Sales Invoice",
		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.nowdate(),
		"customer": customer_to,
		"patient" : doc.patient,
		"so_type": "Pharmacy",
		"cost_center": "Hospital - JSH",
		"is_pos" : 0,
		"items" : pro_items,
		})
	sales_doc.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
	sales_doc.submit()
	doc.db_set("status", "Completed")
	# return sales_doc

frappe.get_doc({
    "doctype": "Recovery",
    "patient" : doc.patient,
    "procedure_template": doc.procedure_template,
    "practitioner" : doc.practitioner
}).insert()

name: Transfer Patient Balance
Transfer Patient Balances
script:
if float(doc.transferred_amount) > float(doc.patient_balance):
    frappe.throw("Transfered Amount is greater then Patient Balance!!")
if doc.patient_balance>0:
    accounts = []
    part_t=''
    acc='1310 - Debtors - JSH'
    party=''
    # frappe.errprint(doc.party)
    if doc.party_type=="Patient":
        part_t= "Customer"
        # acc= "1310 - Debtors - JSH",
        party= frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.party, "customer")
        
    elif doc.party_type=="Customer":
        part_t= "Customer"
        # acc= "1310 - Debtors - JSH",
        party=doc.party
        
    elif doc.party_type=="Employee":
        part_t="Employee"
        acc= "2110 - Creditors - JSH"
        party=doc.party
    
    
    if acc:
        accounts=[{
            "account": acc or "1310 - Debtors - JSH",
            "party_type": part_t,
            "party": party,
            "debit_in_account_currency": doc.transferred_amount,
            "cost_center": doc.cost_center
        
            },
            {
            "account": "1310 - Debtors - JSH",
            "party_type": "Customer",
            "party": doc.customer,
            "credit_in_account_currency": doc.transferred_amount,
            "cost_center": doc.cost_center,
            }]
    
    if accounts:
        Journal = frappe.get_doc({
        		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
        		"posting_date" : doc.date,
        		"accounts": accounts,
        	    "user_remark": doc.remarks,
        		"transfer_patient_balance" : doc.name
        		
        	})
        Journal.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
        Journal.submit()
else:
    frappe.throw("Patient Balance Is les Then 0")

name: Return Update Amount
script:
mode_of_payment=''
pos_profile=''
default_account = ''
return_amount = 0
if doc.is_pos and doc.is_return and not doc.voucher_no:
    pos_profile= frappe.db.get_value("POS Profile User", {"default": 1, "user": frappe.session.user}, "parent")
    if pos_profile:
        mode_of_payment = frappe.db.get_value("POS Payment Method",{"parent": pos_profile}, "mode_of_payment") 
    if mode_of_payment:
        
        default_account = frappe.db.get_value('Mode of Payment Account', {"parent": mode_of_payment},  'default_account')
    if default_account:
        doc.payments[0].mode_of_payment= mode_of_payment
        doc.payments[0].account =default_account
    doc.payments[0].amount= doc.grand_total
    


if doc.is_return and not doc.voucher_no:
    for i in doc.items:
        i.reference_dn=""
        i.reference_dt=""
        i.sales_invoice_item =""
        i.so_detail =""
        i.sales_order =""



cust_balance = frappe.call(
    "erpnext.accounts.utils.get_balance_on",
    date=frappe.utils.getdate(),
    party_type='Customer',
    party=doc.customer
)

# if doc.is_return and not doc.voucher_no:
#     if doc.paid_amount:
#         return_amount = ((doc.grand_total * -1)-(doc.paid_amount * -1 or 0))
#     else:
#         return_amount = (doc.grand_total * -1)
#     if return_amount > cust_balance:
#         frappe.throw(f"Returning amount is greater Then customer Balance because customer balance is {cust_balance} and Returning amount is {return_amount} ")

doc.collected_by= frappe.session.user
doc.collected_time = frappe.utils.now()

Lab Result Update User
script: doc.user= frappe.session.user

name: Patient Discount
Cancel Patient Discount
Daily Cash Transfer
Daily Cash Transfer Journl
Cancel Employee Discount
Employee Discount
Blood Bank
Pricing
script:
template = frappe.get_list("Lab Test Template" , fields = ['name' , 'lab_test_rate', 'item'])
for i in template:
    if frappe.db.exists("Item Price" , {"item_code" : i.item} ):
        item_name =  frappe.db.exists("Item Price" , {"item_code" : i.item}  , 'name')
        item_p = frappe.get_doc("Item Price" , item_name)
        item_p.price_list_rate = i.lab_test_rate
        item_p.save()

name: Return Over Payment Check
script:
return_amount = doc.grand_total
cust_balance = frappe.call(
    "erpnext.accounts.utils.get_balance_on",
    date=frappe.utils.getdate(),
    party_type='Customer',
    party=doc.customer
)

if return_amount > cust_balance:
    frappe.throw(f"Returning amount is greater Then customer Balance because customer balance is {cust_balance} and Returning amount is {return_amount} ")

name: Cancel Return Invoice
VAT
script: frappe.db.set_value("Sales Order", doc.name, { "total_with_vat": (doc.grand_total * 1.05)});

name: Avoid Deplicate Que
script:
quedoc = frappe.db.get_list('Que', 
    filters={
        'date': doc.date, 
        'patient': doc.patient, 
        'practitioner': doc.practitioner,
        'name': ['!=', doc.name] , # This line filters out the current document by its name
        'status': 'open' # This line filters out the current document by its name
    }, 
    fields=['name']
)

if quedoc:
    frappe.throw(f"This Patient {doc.patient_name} has an appointment with doctor {doc.practitioner}  on Today")

# if doc.gender == "Male" and doc.department=="OBS AND GYNO":
#     frappe.throw("The Patient is Male and the doctor department is OBS AND GYNO, So Please Change The Male to make this Appointment!!")

name: Check if Order Is billed
Make Salary Assigment
script:
employee_list = frappe.db.get_list("Employee" , fields = ['name', 'salary'  ] , filters = {"status" : "Active"})
for emp in employee_list:
    assigment = frappe.new_doc("Salary Structure Assignment")
    assigment.employee = emp.name
    assigment.from_date = "2025-01-01"
    assigment.salary_structure = "Emp Salary"
    assigment.payroll_payable_account = "2120 - Payroll Payable - JSH"
    assigment.base = emp.salary
    
    assigment.insert()

if doc.sex == "Male":

name: Commission Transfer
script:
if doc.is_pos and doc.commission>0 and not doc.is_return:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    account=[]
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"52020 - Commission on Sales - "+abbr,
			"debit_in_account_currency": doc.commission,
		    "cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": doc.payments[0].account,
			"credit_in_account_currency": doc.commission,
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
    ]
        
    if account:
        jou = frappe.get_doc({
        		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
        		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
        		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
        		"user_remark": doc.comment,
        		"accounts": account,
        		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
        		
        	})
        jou.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
        jou.submit()





if doc.is_pos and (doc.commission)>0 and doc.is_return:
    abbr= frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "abbr")
    account=[]
    account = [
			
		{
			"account":"52020 - Commission on Sales - "+abbr,
			"credit_in_account_currency": (doc.commission),
		    "cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
		{
			"account": doc.payments[0].account,
# 			"credit_in_account_currency": doc.commission,
            "debit_in_account_currency": (doc.commission),
			"cost_center": doc.cost_center
		},
    ]
        
    if account:
        jou = frappe.get_doc({
        		'doctype': 'Journal Entry',
        		'voucher_type': 'Journal Entry',
        		"posting_date" : frappe.utils.getdate(),
        		"user_remark": doc.comment,
        		"accounts": account,
        		"sales_invoice" : doc.name
        		
        	})
        jou.insert(ignore_permissions = True)
        jou.submit()
        frappe.db.set_value("Sales Invoice",{"name":doc.name},{"commission": doc.commission * - 1 })

        # doc.commission
